item.title: JSON Format
item.description: ACE in Action #editor { position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; } function foo(items) { var x = "All this is syntax highlighted"; return x; } var editor = ace.edit("editor"); editor.setTheme("ace/theme/monokai"); editor.session.setMode("ace/mode/javascript");

item.title: My ECOND Post
item.description: Python Introduction Second Python Before we can start you first need to have a working version of Python on your system. For most linux users you will already have some version of python installed. For Windows users please follow the below steps: Create a folder on your machine where you will be doing your python development. You can do this anywhere you want. Call this folder python. Open the following link in your browser.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Python Introduction Download Python Before we can start you first need to have a working version of Python on your system. For most linux users you will already have some version of python installed. For Windows users please follow the below steps: Create a folder on your machine where you will be doing your python development. You can do this anywhere you want. Call this folder python. Open the following link in your browser.
